sentences.translation: 专业演讲者不需要讲台(不要固定在讲台上)。

sentences.sentence: No more podiums as they obstruct communication between the preacher and audience.
sentences.translation: 讲坛被撤去，因为它被认为妨碍了牧师和会众之间的交流。

sentences.sentence: These days they are popping up on front pages and conference podiums all over the world.
sentences.translation: 这些天他们却频频出现在世界各地的头版和会议前台。
